My Creative Process

All of my visualization and KPI projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Affordance in Design

The User knows understands the visualization properties and the possible actions he/she can take with it. The User is able to look at what is given to them and know exactly what they can do with it.

2

Sensible Display

Visualizations are clear and easy to read. Charts and information are laid out in a way that is captivating and intuitive for the User.

3

A Clear "So-What"

Everyone needs to know, "what do I do with this information." User either leave knowing who they need to go talk to and what they need to say, or he/she develop a new understanding about information.

4

Customer Satisfaction

Audience members are able to interact with a rich, intituive visualizations that can help them make more insightful decisions.
